introduction: SYNOPSISDong-min and Se-young live together. Dong-min dreams of becoming a composer and Se-young works to support him. Ju, the president of a company, is interested in Se-young. Dong-min agrees to compose a piece for Mi-na to lessen Se-young's burden. Because of this, there is a strange tension between Dong-min and Se-young. One day, Se-young succumbs to Ju's advances and gets pregnant. When Dong-min finds it out, he leaves their home. Se-young kills Ju for ruining her life. Due to the shock of committing murder, Se-young shows signs of a mental breakdown and enters a mental institution. Time passes and Dong-min succeeds as a composer. He returns to Se-young bringing his record. The two forgive each other and return to their old apartment.故事一个有抱负的作曲家前往东民和工作seyoung到dwitbaraji他住在公寓里。国家主席shows兴趣seyoung，即东晋决定做一首歌米娜ease seyoung的负担。seyoung与东民之间的这种微妙的冲突所造成的这种关系。有一天seyoung将陷入一周的诱惑，东明总统有一个孩子，它会不出去的房子。Seyoung杀的主要老板毁了自己，代表三个精神分裂症住院冲击。经过多年的东民它带回seyoung通过成功举办的纪录。两个人原谅对方，并找到了老年公寓。
